word: We are in the midst of a decided interest. We have had from the very first a deep interest. The Lord has visited Brother Prescott in a most remarkable manner and given to him the Holy Spirit to give to this people. Delegates have come to the camp meeting from all directions--from New Zealand, Queensland, and Brother Knobbs from Norfolk Island. Those who are not in the truth say, "That man speaks from the inspiration of the Spirit of God."
